document.discussion_title: Big News from Hyatt Ziva Cancun!
document.topic_text: Learn More Terms & Conditions Book five consecutive nights in Turquoize, Adults Only Categories at Hyatt Ziva Cancun and receive the fifth night free. Offer valid for new bookings made now through 5/31/16 for travel through 12/21/16. Reservations are subject to availability and must be made in advance. 50% discount is based on the Hyatt Daily Rate applicable for the stay period. Rate is based on double occupancy. Not combinable with other consumer saving promotions and is not applicable for group bookings. Blackout dates and other restrictions may apply. Offer may be changed or withdrawn at any time. Not responsible for errors or omissions. The Hyatt Ziva™ and Hyatt Zilara™ trademarks and related marks are trademarks of Hyatt International Corporation. © 2016 Hyatt International Corporation. © 2016 Playa Resorts Management is the exclusive Operators for Hyatt Ziva™ and Hyatt Zilara™. PLA06990316
